scripts.dev: webpack --mode development ./src/index.jsx --output ./static/frontend/index.js && webpack --mode development src/play.jsx --output ./static/frontend/play.js && webpack --mode development ./src/games.jsx --output ./static/frontend/games.js
scripts.build: webpack --mode production ./src/index.jsx --output ./static/frontend/index.js && webpack --mode production src/play.jsx --output ./static/frontend/play.js && webpack --mode production ./src/games.jsx --output ./static/frontend/games.js
